name: The Academy of Business in Society
goal: ABIS is a non-profit network of institutional members committed to the mainstreaming of corporate responsibility, sustainability, and business in society issues into management practice and education. It functions as a bridge between the corporate and academic worlds, connecting members with similar interests to shape and deliver projects which support large companies in aligning sustainability with their business strategy and business models, which enable business schools and universities to accelerate change in their core educational programmes and curricula, and which inspire a broader research and innovation agenda that creates insights linked to more sustainable futures for industry and society.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
European Commission Communication on CSR; Circular Economy Package
European Commission programmes: H2020 and Erasmus +
